name: Rescue Me!
description:
Made for Mini Jam #129: Poison - Limitation: You are not a hero

There is a poisonous gas leak in the building and people went to the rooftop waiting for help. Fortunately, the hero is here! Raise your hands to get picked up and rescued before you run out of air.

Controls:

  • A, D, Left arrow, Right arrow: Move
  • W, Up arrow: Raise hands
  • S, Down arrow: Crouch
  • Space, 0(numpad): Push other people
